raised.$description: Use for cards and other elements that needs to be slightly raised over content layer to draw user attention but should not go over other elements in the UI.

overflow.$description: Use to create a shadow when content scrolls under other content.

overlay.$description: Use for elements that sit on top of the UI such as dialog, modal, dropdown menu and whenever it requires full attention of the user on the element. User is not able to interact with what is behind.

sunken.$description: Use to create a shadow when an element is sunk below the current surface.
